EmailTemplate.name: VMworld 2014 VIP Cocktail Party.Reg Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: VMTurbo VMworld VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
You are confirmed! We are throttled to hear you'll be joining us at Twenty Five Lusk on Monday, August 25th after a lightspeed day at VMworld.
Be sure to fasten your seatbelt, stop by Booth #405, and learn about the New Hope for the Datacenter.
VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception Monday, August 25, 2014 | 6:00-8:00 p.m. Twenty Five Lusk 25 Lusk Street San Francisco, CA 94107
From the Rebellion Vanguard, Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
